Ein Blick in unser Blut verrat so einiges uber unsere Gesundheit. Mit ein paar Tropfen erfahren Mediziner vieles uber den Zustand von Herz, Leber oder Niere. Aber Blut kann noch mehr: Durch Liquid Biopsy konnen Tumorzellen im Blut nachgewiesen und der genaue Krebs-Typ bestimmt werden. Das ermoglicht gezielte Therapien. Fur Manche hat menschliches Blut sogar heilende Krafte.

titles.title: Quarks - Gesund Und Lecker - Worauf Es Beim Brot Ankommt

descriptions.desc: Bis zu 500 verschiedene Aromastoffe stecken in einem Brot. Und was sonst noch? Wie sieht es mit Zusatzstoffen aus - und mit Nahrstoffen? Wie bekommt man es hin, dass ein Brot lecker ist und dazu auch noch gut fur die Gesundheit? Wie geht gutes Brot - und woran kann man es erkennen? Welches ist das beste Getreide, das beste Mehl? Und was machen traditionelle Backer anders als Maschinen?

Lewa Conservancy is working to return elephants to territory from Mt. Kenya to Samburu National Park. They've also created an elephant exclusion zone to try and restore a damaged ecosystem. Radio tracking collars are used for both initiatives to help conservationists better understand the elephants' needs-and to see if they're returning to their natural corridors.

The Lilayi Elephant Nursery near Lusaka in Zambia is home to four orphan elephants. The two oldest, four-year- olds Musolole and Zambezi, have been here since they were just a few months old. These boisterous babies are out-growing the nursery and it's time to move to big school. Two hundred miles away, in the heart of Kafue National Park, lies elephant heaven - Camp Phoenix, the project's release facility, where older orphans are already adapting to life in the wild.

In a park where land meets sea, the natural elements combine to create wonderful variety. Cola-colored water feeds forests green and dense. In this small patch of woodland, two young monkeys face the toughest time of their lives. As they find their place in the world, they must learn which neighbours are allies, and which are foes. Despite their reputation as Australia's best known animals, koala populations are only found in the east and southeast parts of the country. Although they live in a wide range of forests, from arid to tropical to temperate, their populations are often isolated from each other by areas of unsuitable habitat.

In the grasslands of the southern Kalahari towers a magnificent Camelthorn . This Acacia has stood on this spot for two centuries. descriptions.desc: At night in the corner of a roadside station, rest areas along roads, several cars with sealed windows are often parked. In several cases, living in the car damages their health to death. The program tries to uncover issues behind this emerging social problem.
